summary: Completed comprehensive testing of GradeSense AI-powered grading tool MVP. Backend APIs are fully functional with 100% success rate. Frontend login and dashboard work correctly, but some navigation issues and Select component errors found.

ui_bugs.component: Select components in Upload & Grade form
ui_bugs.issue: Select.Item components throwing runtime errors about empty string values
ui_bugs.selector: Select dropdowns for Batch/Class, Subject, Exam Type
ui_bugs.error_details: A <Select.Item /> must have a value prop that is not an empty string

integration_issues.issue: Some navigation menu items not accessible via text selectors
integration_issues.details: Navigation items exist but may have different text or structure

passed_tests: All CRUD operations (batches, subjects, students, exams)
Upload & Grade page navigation and form display
User profile display and quick actions
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix Select component value prop errors in Upload & Grade form. Ensure all Select.Item components have non-empty string values. Verify navigation menu item text matches expected selectors.

success_percentage.frontend: 85% (login, dashboard, basic navigation working, minor Select component issues)
